title: Why does everyone hate on riot in every way shape and form
body:
The game it has bugs sure, no need to rage at riot for it OCE has only been here for a year kinks are still being ironed out and with how many people play the game im not suprised the server struggles

Toxicity of players is not riot's fault its our fault we made them like that because we began the raging

Music, sure some of you don't like it, but that's your opinion no one needs to know that you think a certain piece of music is rubbish im sure there are more people who like the music than there are who don't

replies.body:
Like when the music files were released (the log in screens, jinxed and the curse of the sad mummy) "all these songs are %%%%" was all i saw all over boards, and then now with the electronic DJ sona stuff this electronic stuff is crap blah blah blah.

Tbh i love riot, their game, their content sure i have issues with some things but i don't post it all over twitter, YT, boards and the facebook page. Riot have done well to keep this game going when they don't have to with all the hate they get it suprises me they continue making this game

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qby14Tlm,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-03T23:46:09.349+0000)
> 
> Music, sure some of you don't like it, but that's your opinion no one needs to know that you think a certain piece of music is rubbish im sure there are more people who like the music than there are who don't

I'd like to add: no one is forcing you to listen to the music. You don't have to watch the youtube vids, there is an option to turn in-game music down to 0. Don't complain about something you can control.

The people who like Riot's work don't complain about it.

They are the silent majority.

There are way more people enjoying Riot's work than there are complaining about it.
it's amazing how much hate riot OCE gets. especially for things outside of their control.
I don't hate on Riot they are doing as best as they can bugs always come up in programs it can't be helped and when they do Riot is usually fast to get rid of the problem

Bugs aren't an issue of OCE has been here a year' as we get the same patches as NA, just somethings a little different to appeal to the OCE region. But RIot used to be an amazing company before their game got famous. Riot Hippalu$ also happened.
